text:
<@U6W3H6YN8> that's roughly what we arrived at for the daily digest people (we have Google Cloud trigger that pokes a HS serverless action and get "new rows" from HubDB).

With workflows, we could check that same endpoint, but we don't have Operations Hub (so not sure we can do step 2). That plus Transactional Email would come to a lot of £££ however.
We have got a "row processed" boolean that means we wont alert twice.

Brand new free theme in the marketplace. Download, tinker around, and share some feedback! <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website/exuberant-growth-theme-by-remotish|https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website/exuberant-growth-theme-by-remotish>
Can I add custom CSS classes to HubSpot rows/columns on specific pages?

Hi everyone, I search for the best method to show Experiments and Personalizations in HubSpot using trackEvent or the new trackCustomBehavioralEvent. What would you prefer how to show the data in HubSpot?
Hi all, I’m having issues with a deal drop down, the search text is not showing, any ideas
